description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Stevenage v Birmingham City in the EFL Trophy.
title: Stevenage v Birmingham City
title_page: Stevenage v Birmingham City: EFL Trophy stats & head-to-head - BBC Sport
maintext:
Post
Fourth official has announced 7 minutes of added time.
Post
Attempt blocked. Keshi Anderson (Birmingham City) left footed shot from the left side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Jay Stansfield.
Goal!
Goal! Stevenage 0, Birmingham City 1. Jay Stansfield (Birmingham City) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom right corner. Assisted by Marc Leonard with a through ball.
